entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Saskatoon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
